summary: Consume the Microsoft Graph Security API to retrieve secure scores and control profiles.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to retrieve data for (e.g., Secure Score, Secure Score Control Profile).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Get, Get Many, Update).

parameters.name: secure score id
parameters.description: ID of the secure score to retrieve.

parameters.name: return all
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Add filters to refine the results (e.g., Filter Query Parameter, Include Control Scores).

parameters.name: secure score control profile id
parameters.description: ID of the secure score control profile to retrieve or update.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Name of the provider of the security product or service.

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: Name of the vendor of the security product or service.

parameters.name: update fields
parameters.description: Add fields to update the secure score control profile (e.g., State).
